text: @RepAdamSchiff Impeach him again, but this time don't make it so narrow. Impeach him for commuting Stone's sentence, impeach him for his Covid-19 response. Impeach him for using military to clear peaceful protesters for a photo op. Maybe he could be convicted in Nov. right after the election?
